April 08, 2025

📺 🇯🇵 Wind Breaker 2x1

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Straight into action, good! The music was great and the fights were animated decently.

Good that it's back. It reminds me I need to catch up to the manga.

Are you watching this season?

April 07, 2025

📺 🇯🇵 Fire Force 3x1

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Fire Force is back! It caught me off guard, I had forgotten about this series. I didn't like Season 2 https://anime.ricard.blog/rants/fire-force-season-2/ but I will watch Season 3, it has potential.

The first sparring scene between Arthur and Shinra, that beginning is well-animated. I got excited but then dropped to regular animation. Let's see if they spend the money this season.

#FireForce #Anime #Review

Kumamoto city and castle, Japan 2023

April 02, 2025

🇰🇷 On April 2nd 2023 I was landing in South Korea for a night layover on my way to Japan 😋

I met with my Korean friends for a BBQ. It was fantastic 💯

The only thing I do not recommend is drinking upon landing, the jet lag takes longer to go away for me when I do 😴

#Meat #Food #SouthKorea #Seoul #Travel #Alcohol

April 01, 2025

🆕 Anime Review

I Have a Crush at Work

⭐️⭐️⭐️

A surprisingly sweet and sometimes spicy short series about a couple dating while working at the same company.
There is no crazy drama, just two lovers trying to keep their dating a secret while having to interact at work.

➡️ https://anime.ricard.blog/reviews/i-have-a-crush-at-work/

#Anime #Review #IHaveACrushAtWork

April 01, 2025

🇯🇵 That time in 2024 when I visited one of the most rural areas of my trip. Certainly the only foreigner around this area.

The train stations had only 1 set of tracks, bi-directional. It was fantastic to experience.

Rest of the photos with food included: https://www.quicoto.com/demasiado-rural-viaje-a-japon-2024/

#Travel #Japan #Fukishima #Photography #TravelPhotography

April 01, 2025

🆕 Anime Review

Solo Leveling: Season 2

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

This season even though it has had some awesome fighting scenes seems to have mellowed down a bit from the first one.

#SoloLeveling #Anime #Review

➡️ https://anime.ricard.blog/reviews/solo-leveling-season-2/

🆕 Anime Review

The Apothecary Diaries (Season 1)

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

This anime has a beautiful art style and gives us a glimpse of ancient China. It’s not fast-paced, its 24-episode length season has ups and downs. It picks up interest towards the end when they start wrapping up the main storyline.

➡️ https://anime.ricard.blog/reviews/the-apothecary-diaries-season-1/

🇯🇵 📺 Solo Leveling 1x22

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

The other S-Rank fights were not that impressive.

I liked how the smirky healer lost her head in a blink of an eye. In your next life take your job seriously.

February 24, 2025

📺 🇯🇵 Anime Rant

Boku no Hero Academia (Season 7)

This season was not brave enough❗

My main problem with this season is that it seemed not brave enough to do what should have been done. Some of the episodes and scenes deserved characters simply dying. Epic fights that ended up with a clear foresight that the character will not perish.

Let's discuss!

➡️ https://anime.ricard.blog/rants/boku-no-hero-academia-season-7/

#Anime #BokuNoHeroAcademia #Review

- 3.348 shots with my camera.
- 445.000 steps done.
- 350km walked.
- Many Korean barbecues eaten.

Looking forward to be back home with my cat, family, friends. Going back to my clases, badminton trainings, drums...

It's a 14-hour non-stop flight. It's a lot but better than doing stops mid-way.

@shoesmithlc 😂

February 11, 2025

You don't realize how much you miss fiber internet speed from home until you're roaming abroad using hotel's wifi.

The sites feel sluggish, uploading photos is just slow. Web apps are not well prepared for slow and spotty connections.

It's our fault, really. We should build better apps.

February 08, 2025

I always buy a phone case the moment I change phones. I don't recall the last time I dropped my phone, it just never happens, I'm very careful 📱

Today the case made its value worth when my phone fell from my hands for the first time since in years. I'm quite confident the impact would have shattered the screen, the case did it's job well 😌

Don't tell me you're a fearless case-less phone user... 👀

#Korea2025

February 03, 2025

🇰🇷 So, I made a small mistake while booking this hotel months ago. One night less than what I thought I did 😱

I went down to the hotel reception and asked to extend my stay +1 night 👌

The clerk told me to use the same online platform I did before to do the reservation of one extra night 🤔

The prices seemed equal if not lower in their price list (visible on the wall) compared to online 🤑

To my surprise on Booking it was -5€ cheaper 💰

Thank you, Mr Clerk 😁

#Korea2025

February 03, 2025

🇰🇷 Just got this alert on my phone:

"[Daejeon Metropolitan City] A cold wave warning has been issued from 9 p.m. tonight. ▲ Refrain from going out ▲ Please wear winter clothing and take care to keep warm."

It can't be that terrible if kids are playing baseball outside right now:

February 02, 2025

📍 Seoul, South Korea

I can't help but notice I find more rude people here in South Korea than in Japan. Especially older people. Elders. Multiple times I have seen them rush into a metro train without letting others exit first.

Several other small things I have not encountered in my 4 trips to Japan.

January 31, 2025

📍Seoul, South Korea

I saw a young woman in the bullet train using discord with several servers chatting at the speed of light. In English 😯

I couldn't help but peak, as she seats next to me 🙈

Not only her English is fantastic 💯 but they are sharing stuff as if in an encrypted communication tool.

I don't love that #Discord is not encrypted. Wondering what's out there that's similar but offers more safety?

@myska WordPress.com and WordPress.org is not the same.

January 26, 2025

📺 🇯🇵 Solo Leveling 16

⭐ ⭐

Pretty boring episode.

- What a crappy machine if it tells you “error” instead of “this person is S-Rank, I can’t measure it.” Quite a nonsensical scene.

- I don't understand why he didn't tell the Chairman, "I want to join but not for an office position, I want to go to A-rank raids". I don’t understand why he says no to the job offer to then go be a miner.

- The animation of them mining the minerals not very well done, unnatural.

#Anime #Review #SoloLeveling

@neekeeteen What's "hard banding"?

Thank you very much

January 19, 2025

What's a travel gadget you can't go without❓✈️

Doing my list for my upcoming trip 📝

I just added something new to mine. An ethernet cable and adapter to my MacBook. I've had to deal with weak wifi in the past and it's a pain for photo backup during the trip. I recall seeing a lot of ethernet ports in hotel rooms in Japan 🇯🇵 and South Korea 🇰🇷 I hope they're still a thing 🔌

January 16, 2025

Every. Single. Time I buy something online that's not shipped by Amazon I get such a bad delivery experience 👎

❌ Fake estimates on delivery times

❌ They some times don't tell you the day. Just "we're out for delivery".

❌ Poor tracking experience when out on delivery (Amazon gives you a real time map!)

❌ Delivering to a pick up location often times is not possible unless there's a failed attempt at your home.

January 15, 2025

@ayo It just sysops issue, not the software I think. I'm not that proficient when it comes to server administration.

I think if you have 2 separate machines or docker, it works on the first try.

I was excited but I think it's just easier if I stick to my single-user Mastodon instance.

Posted some more info here: https://ricard.social/@ricard/113832229582725782

January 15, 2025

@dansup It's a very nice work, Daniel.

Maybe it's just not for me (as I intended to hace a single-user instance, just as I have my Mastodon instance)

Keep up the good job!

January 15, 2025

@dansup Thanks for reaching out.

Here's my setup and the issues I had:

- I had installed Pixelfed in the same Ubuntu system as I have Mastodon (both from source, no docker)
- I used 2 different domains
- It seems Redis had conflicts (it wiped feeds from Mastodon lists randomly), users suggested having 2 instances for Redis.
- I wasn't able to follow my account from Mastodon. I found it in Mastodon but I got no updates when posting on Pixelfed. Horizon dashboard showed all success, no failure.

January 15, 2025

I have given up on self-hosting #Pixelfed ❌

I will share photos here with this Mastodon account. Easier, done ✅

January 05, 2025

I have a brain conflict 🧠

In a few weeks I'm going to South Korea 🇰🇷 for vacation, so I'm focusing my entertainment time with Korean Dramas to get more vocabulary and listening 🙊

However, I do want to see the new anime coming out like #SoloLeveling 😂 I fear if I keep watching anime my brain will not be able to handle this and I'll be speaking Japanese in Korea 🇯🇵

Maybe I can just get an exception for Solo Leveling? 🙏

December 12, 2024

😯 I just enabled the Android's phone (Pixel only?) setting: Call Screen

It's amazing. You can let the robot take the call for you and give you a transcript/recording later.

You can see the transcript real-time and allows you to command the robot to answer in different ways.

https://support.google.com/phoneapp/answer/9118387?hl=en

December 12, 2024

@fantinel I just turned on Android's Call Screen feature.

It's amazing. Just tried it out with a friend.

December 12, 2024

@fantinel I might have to do that 🫠

Are you using Android? iOS?

December 12, 2024

@Crowjane Using Android I appreciate when Google is smart enough to show the unknown caller in red with a text that reads something like "possible spam". With the screenless I wouldn't know if it's one of my contacts 😁

Getting tired of this.

December 11, 2024

🇯🇵 📺 Loner Life in Another World 1x1

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Started this one today, an Isekai, it's been a while since I tried this genre. To watch something different.

The animation is very basic but the dialog so far is very meta, I like it. I feel somewhat identified with the main character, who accepts the challenge of being dropped in an isekai but wants to enjoy it alone 😂

#Anime #Review #HitoribocchiNoIsekaiKouryaku #LonerLifeInAnotherWorld

December 09, 2024

✅ "Your K-ETA application has been approved"

✈️ 🇰🇷 One step closer to my trip to South Korea in January 2025 🥶

The form takes 5 minutes to fill out and the approval came within 2 hours. The payment is around 7€. The document is valid for 3 years.

🆕 Anime Review

Oblivion Battery

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

⚠️ This review contains spoilers

If you like ⚾ baseball you might like this Boukyaku Battery.

An unstoppable pitcher/catcher duo is now entering high school and have everyone sweating. Without an explanation, we’re presented with the catcher having had an accident and now all his baseball memories are gone.

➡️ https://anime.ricard.blog/reviews/oblivion-battery/

#Anime #Review #OblivionBattery

Are you like me who creates spreadsheets for trips with all the details? 🤓

November 21, 2024

It turns out there is no longer a Black Friday, as in 1 day. At least in Spain, Amazon and other online stores do "Black Friday Week". It has begun.

Of course with fake discounts left and right. Remember to use CamelCamelCamel to uncover those fake Amazon discounts!

November 21, 2024

@vegos_f06 I think it is that simple, if they wanted to.

Currently, can't be done. But they could do that, follow and implement the standard protocols.

I assume they just don't want to. Their business relies on people being in a walled garden to serve ads, etc.

Crossposting is nice to get the word out but I want interaction not just broadcasting.

November 21, 2024

📺 🇯🇵 Oblivion Battery

Started this one yesterday and liked it very much. Not what I was expecting from a sports anime.

It's animated by MAPPA and even if the style is not very traditional, the animation si good.

I'm just 3 episodes in out of 12. Will do a proper review once I'm done.

#Anime #Review #OblivionBattery

November 20, 2024

Look at this beast "cachopo"

"Cachopo is a dish characteristic of Asturian cuisine. It consists of two large veal fillets and includes ham and cheese"

Tried two of these last weekend but I can't say I love it. It's just too much meat, too heavy.

Now, the apple cider that helped wash it down was great! Especially how they serve it.

📸 https://ricard.photos/%F0%9F%8D%96-%F0%9F%A5%93/

#Food #Meat #acohol

November 20, 2024

📖 Book Review

A Grimm Sacrifice (Grimm’s War, #4)

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Just finished the 4th book of this series. It might start slow but picks up with action packed chapters towards the end.
I was not expecting to rate it this high but won me over at the end.

I already bought the 5th book and it's loaded on my Kindle 😁

➡️ https://ricard.blog/books/

#Books #Reviews #SpaceOpera #Space

November 14, 2024

📺 🇯🇵 I'm 3 episodes into #BlueLock Season 2 and the animation is not great 😕

⚽ What happened here? We got a bunch of scenes with static drawings, some CGI (although less than in season 1) but the signature animation has been missing.

Did they cut back on the budget? 💰

I'm quite disappointed. If I want to see static images with dialog, I'll read the manga 📖

🆕 Anime Review

Blue Lock: Episode Nagi

⭐⭐⭐

The movie between season 1 and season 2 was just average. This is not a movie you can watch without having seen the first part. Even if they show some of the scenes and lines from the main season you lack all the context.

➡️ https://anime.ricard.blog/reviews/blue-lock-episode-nagi/

I tried my best on 2022 but failed miserable when I could only produce 21.557 of unedited words. Not even half way the 50K goal 💀

Good luck to those typing away this month! 💪

September 25, 2024

Today I used GitHub Copilot to write groundbreaking code to comply with the project's naming convention:

"const myCamelCasedVariable = true"

I highlighted the variable name and told it to: "capitalize and underscore" and in less than a second it generated:

"const MY_CAMEL_CASED_VARIABLE = true"

Goods stuff 🙃

When you click on our partners bookmarks and Speed Dials and make a purchase, this can result in Vivaldi earning a commission. Affiliate programs and affiliations include, but are not limited to, the eBay Partner Network.

August 27, 2024

@faisal I would hope not. I did my best to express my dissatisfaction towards the whole process.

The agent signed off with a smile:

"Thank you for contacting us, have a great day!"

Sure, for one euro it's not about the money. But it leaves a bad aftertaste when they would prefer to spend more in transport and processing than simply refunding me 1€.

In the past they gave me a book for free (like 8€) when I wanted to return it when I purchased in the wrong language.

August 27, 2024

Amazon seems to have changed their policy 📝

I bought an SD card the other day, I picked it up today 📦

The price has dropped -1€ just as I went to pick it up.

Contacted Amazon to ask for a price match refund.

Amazon said no, I need to return it and order it again 😮

They are willing to do the whole return and ship it again (Amazon Prime) for 1€ difference 😲

This is nuts. In the past they did refund me the price difference when this happened 🤷‍♂️

I suppose my time is not worth 1€.

August 27, 2024

@scribbbleanime It's a nightmare (in a good way).

You're going to certain place for whatever reason but you get sidetracked for other things you find along the way, this game is madness 😂

August 26, 2024

@hdv Yeah, read that. Thanks

The thing is I was trying to get rid of some JS from my custom tooltip implementation by using this new API, not add more JS to calculate the position 😁

August 26, 2024

👨‍💻 Was excited to try and implemented the new and shiny Popover API https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Popover_API

When I couldn't position it relative to my parent element I came across this post from @hdv 👀

https://hidde.blog/positioning-anchored-popovers/

Which very well explains we can't use Popovers as tooltips for now without JS :blobcat_sadlife:

We need to wait until we have Anchor Positioning in CSS in all browsers https://caniuse.com/css-anchor-positioning

I'm very disappointed 😞

#CSS #WebDevelopment #Frontend #HTML

2022 🇰🇷 South Korea
2023 🇯🇵 Japan
2024 🇯🇵 Japan
2025 ????

To be honest I would love to do 🇯🇵 #Japan at the end of winter, like February. Enjoy the cold, snow, hot springs... ♨️

Thoughts?

July 29, 2024

@talksina What I love about the Markdown files is that I don't need to worry about ever exporting in a different format. Surely you can export with WordPress but it would be an extra step, and not as clean as Markdown.

Having to keep both up to date it would be even more hassle for me. I have sites with just WordPress and others with just Markdown 😊

July 29, 2024

@talksina Do you keep the text files after you publish to WordPress?

July 29, 2024

@jimniels Looks very tasty, Jim!

July 29, 2024

I like #blogging with just text files (markdown) for all the reasons (portability, no backend dependency...) but at the same time #WordPress makes it so effortless. One click publish 💜

Every few months I'm like "should I change my blog stack again?"

Thankfully I'm more mature now and come to my senses :blobcatgiggle:

🆕 Anime Review

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Hashira Training Arc

With an overrated score of 8/10 on MyAnimeList this season of Kimetsu no Yaiba is the weakest we’ve seen so far. Despite what the fanboys and fangirls tell you, the episodes are boring and this could have been easily cut in half...

June 28, 2024

"Why Google Sheets ported its calculation worker from JavaScript to WasmGC  |  web.dev"

"Calculations in Google Sheets were initially done on the server, then on the client in JavaScript, and now on the client in WebAssembly Garbage Collection. This case study explains how and why."

➡️ https://web.dev/case-studies/google-sheets-wasmgc

#JavaScript #Frontend #WebDevelopment

June 28, 2024

"Ecma International approves ECMAScript 2024: What’s new?"

"On 26 June 2024, the 127th Ecma General Assembly approved the ECMAScript 2024 language specification, which means that it's officially a standard now. This blog post explains what's new."

➡️ https://2ality.com/2024/06/ecmascript-2024.html

#JavaScript #Frontend #WebDevelopment

May 30, 2024

This is very interesting because the free version is 3.5 but you can use a GPT (official from Open AI) called "ChatGPT Classic" which uses version 4. Loophole found!

"Custom GPTs open for free ChatGPT users" from The Verge

"OpenAI rolled out new features to free ChatGPT users, including custom GPTs, data analytics, and vision — capabilities previously locked to paying subscribers"

➡️ https://www.theverge.com/2024/5/29/24167436/chatgpt-4o-custom-gpts-free

Today is spend-all-your-savings-in-manga day 🌹 🐉 📖

23rd of April, the only day of the year in which bookstores in Spain 🇪🇸 can offer you -10% off on all books 💰

April 16, 2024

Jet lag is still hitting me, after being 3 weeks in Japan ⛩️

Yesterday woke up at 4AM, today 5AM 😪

I might need two more days to go back to Barcelona's timezone 😁 ⏰

✈️ It's interesting how easy it is to fallback to home time (flying West). When I fly East to Japan 🇯🇵 or South Korea 🇰🇷 it takes me way longer and hits me way harder 🤔

April 08, 2024

Something I'll miss from Japan is the convenience stores 🇯🇵

They are... well... very convenient. Plus, they're everywhere 🏪

We do have some similar stores in Barcelona but 24 hours just a handful. With the extra pain that usually are more expensive than a regular supermarket 💰

Do you have these in your area?

#Japan2024 🇯🇵

April 03, 2024

I have been watching #SousouNoFrieren while on the train here in Japan and I have such mixed feelings.

I'm on episode 7 and on one side I despise the main character who has zero empathy for her old party and what it meant to spend 10 years together, every day.

I get that time is relative but...

I'm also sad Himmel isn't there anymore, I would like to see a spin-off of their journey 😂

#Anime

April 02, 2024

⚾🧢 Very good to see the #RedSox :boston_redsox: take the first game of the series with the #Athletics

#MLB #Baseball

April 02, 2024

📍 Fukushima

I was sitting the bullet train this morning at 7AM ready to go to Sendai, wanted to see the fish market (auction) but the shinkansen line was stopped ❌

Trains did not go in or out of Fukushima 🚅

Waited for an hour in the train and then left to explore the city 🚶‍♂️

As I was exiting the station TV crews were preparing for broadcast 📡

This is my 4th trip to Japan and I've already had several train delays cancellations. Never seen before 😮

#Japan2024 🇯🇵

April 01, 2024

@mdmrn I am collecting the printed Catalan translation, I'm on 9/45 and they release one every 2 months... It will take me a while 🥲

These infinite roads with nothing surrounding them but desert. I was very stunned. Had to stop the car to take a picture or two.

More ➡️ https://www.quicoto.com/el-batido-de-la-ruta-66-arizona/

#USA #California #Arizona #photography #StreetPhotography #TravelPhotography #Travel #FujiX100 #Fujifilm #X100

February 22, 2024

@akmur So true about refunds or delivery issues 🔥

My favorite feature has to be the Amazon lockers or counters. I have a store around the corner that can take all my packages. So I don't have to worry about being home. It's so convenient.

Sure, other providers have similar things but they just don't work that well.

February 22, 2024

@akmur I've talked to people in other countries which have had different experiences.

In Spain, especially near big areas, it works very well.

You can tell #Amazon spent millions in R+D to make shopping and delivery the best possible experience.

February 22, 2024

The moment you have a hiccup with #Amazon or take their logistics for granted, try buying something anywhere else online.

The experience is so much worse at all levels (the package tracking, the website ease of use, the guaranteed delivery date, the speed of delivery itself... next day delivery is just too fast).

I just got reminded of this 🚚 📦

On my 2nd trip to the land of the rising sun, we had such a nice experience visiting the mountain area of Takayama.

We ate at a very authentic local tavern a bunch of skewers and refreshing beer. The hot summer sweat was all gone for the evening.

The rival band war arc (?) is almost over. Not sure if the last fight will be as good as the one Sakura had.

Good pace, intense panels and good overall even if some of the backstories were not as interesting.

February 07, 2024

:css3: CSS Scroll Margin is so simple, yet improves so much the anchor experience, adding the much breathing room

Look at this snippet:

```
[id] {
scroll-margin-top: 2em;
}
```

➡️ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/scroll-margin

#CSS #Frontend #WebDevelopment

January 16, 2024

:html5: :safari: This eluded my radar.

On Safari TP you can use "switch" attribute in an input type checkbox and it turns into a switch

➡️ Demo: https://codepen.io/Rik/pen/gOEYZgE?editors=1000

➡️ Release: https://webkit.org/blog/14885/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-185/

#Safari #WebDevelopment #Frontend #HTML

January 12, 2024

@hdv I used to save them on a micro site I had built with WordPress.

I eventually stopped as I already have my own Mastodon instance where I share the links (not deleted/lost).

I upload my Mastodon archive to make it searchable fast: https://quicoto.github.io/mastodon-archive/

Easy access/search in a single HTML page.

Additionally I save the most relevant to my private wiki.

January 12, 2024

January 09, 2024

These days I tend to share a wide range of topics (web development, photography, anime, manga...)

ℹ️ Friendly reminder, if you're using #Mastodon, you can filter out keywords or hashtags you don't want to see in your timeline (Preferences > Filters)

While still follow people for their other content :blobcatthumbsup:

➡️ https://docs.joinmastodon.org/user/moderating/

🇯🇵 📚 Blue Exorcist - Volume 3

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

This volume was very easy and fast to read. Good!

January 03, 2024

@jantzen The web client requires a subscription, right? I don't follow enough content to justify spending on this.

January 03, 2024

@panda Looks very powerful, for less than 10 podcasts I follow I think Feedly might do just fine in my case.

The only downside (or not) is that I get the audio file without speed controls (simple <audio> tag).

So I hit the provided "download" link in the RSS item and play it locally at desired speed.

Funny enough most of the web players like iTunes do not provide a speed control 🤷‍♂️

January 03, 2024

With Google Podcasts closing I considered setting a self-hosted RSS player and migrate there.

However since I already use Feedly for regular RSS feeds, I just added the podcasts there.

What's your go-to desktop web app for podcasts?

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

I’m continuing to like these long chapters. We haven’t had amazing panels in this volume with Kuro or Mahiru fighting. We’ve got two new characters, so the story moved forward. Not sure what the next volume will bring, as usual, I want more fights.

January 02, 2024

🇯🇵 📚 Kimetsu no Yaiba volume 3 ✅

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

We had very decent fights here. Not much talking and chapters full of action. We got introduced to a new character, even if so slightly and we got to see Zenitsu’s speed. Now he just needs to be a little bit braver.

I don’t think we will have so much fighting in the next volume. Let’s see!

➡️ https://manga.ricard.blog/reviews/kimetsu-no-yaiba/volume/3/

December 27, 2023

🇯🇵 📺 ZOM 100 1x12

⭐ ⭐

Such a mediocre ending.

I expected so much more from the series. It's a good thing it has an open-ended finale but these 3 last chapters have been garbage.

In the end, the father does not have cancer but hemorrhoids (fun!), everything returns to normal and no one has died 🤷

Akira has a very good heart and he forgives everyone. I don't know...

Would I recommend the series? Well, the first 6-8, no doubt. The rest? Meh.

#Zom100
#Zom100BucketListOfTheDead
#Anime

December 27, 2023

🇯🇵 📺 ZOM 100 1x11

⭐ ⭐

I'm not sure if this episode deserves 1 star, it was so bad.

I don't know what the author's intention was, honestly. Should we feel sorry for these people who, because they are miserable, want to kill innocent people?

They are scum. If they are so unhappy on this planet, jump off a bridge or ask for help. But to harm innocent people for fun?

I am very disappointed with this series. It started great and went downhill.

#Zom100
#Zom100BucketListOfTheDead
#Anime

December 27, 2023

🇯🇵 📺 ZOM 100 1x10

⭐ ⭐

Such a boring episode. Nothing happened.

The old man feeling up our main character was disgusting.

Akira's new hairstyle is awful.

The "bad guys" killing innocent villagers is horrifying.

So much waiting for this and we got this episode. Disappointed.

#Zom100 #Zom100BucketListOfTheDead #Anime

🇯🇵 📚 Ao Ashi Volume 10 ✅

🇯🇵 📺 Jujutsu Kaisen 45

December 11, 2023

🆕 🎙️ Frontend Coffee Break

Episode 23: Impostor Syndrome in Frontend

What is the Impostor Syndrome? How to fight it? Why is it more common than we think in Frontend development? We discuss this and offer some tips that have worked for us!

🎧 https://frontendcoffeebreak.transistor.fm/s1/23

:youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=heULnivsm64

#Podcast #FECoffeeBreak #Frontend

December 11, 2023

:javascript: It has been a while since quickly bootstrapped a #Vue project, pleasantly surprised with the provided quick start 🏎️

One NPM line gets you set up with the Vue app, unit testing, E2E testing, linting, prettier... :blobcataww:

It's fantastic to see the state of the frontend tooling in 2023 😎 So easy!

➡️ https://vuejs.org/guide/quick-start.html

#Vue #JavaScript #Frontend #WebDevelopment

December 11, 2023

✈️ #Vueling does not send proper HTML markup in their emails so Gmail can detect the flight dates and auto add the events to the Calendar.

It can't be that hard :blobcat_sadlife:

December 10, 2023

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

🇯🇵 📚 Bakuman volume 7! ✅

The volume started very strong with a big twist. It got heated quickly between our duo and the editor but I feel the outcome wasn’t as good. Like we’re back in the same place, the relationship with the editor is the same, and water is under the bridge. I don’t know…

Maybe I hate too high hopes for the story? I expect too much? What do I even expect?

➡️ https://manga.ricard.blog/reviews/bakuman/chapter/61/

#Manga #Bakuman #BakumanManga

December 04, 2023

🆕 Manga review: Midori no Hibi - Volume 1

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Got the nine volumes for this series from a friend for cheap, so I gave it a try. I think did watch the anime many years ago but never read the manga, nor had any interest.

Don’t get me wrong, volume one was easy to read and fun but not something I’d invest money in having so many other good series in my to-purchase list.

➡️ https://manga.ricard.blog/reviews/midori-no-hibi/volume/1/

#MidoriNoHibiManga #Manga #MidoriNoHibi

November 30, 2023

🇯🇵 📺 Jujutsu Kaisen 43

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

A little disappointed with this episode. It started great, cool fight on both fronts. Then the flashback was cheaply drawn, in my opinion (was the manga drawn this way? no mouth? simple comical style?).

In the end, they did not even show or animate her face exploding. This begs the question, is she dead? If she is, would've liked a front view not a back with a splash. Maybe she isn't dead?

How will Itadori get out of this one?

#JujutsuKaisen #Anime

November 29, 2023

In Spain there isn't Black Friday sales for books 📚 :blobcat_sadlife:

💰 The book prices are regulated nation-wide and no discounts can be applied other than the maximum 5% (with the exception of an additional +5% on April 23rd) 🌹 📖

Regardless... I bought some #manga 🇯🇵 as I have finished the volumes I had sitting unread 😂

Will share a photo when delivered :ablobcatbongo:

November 07, 2023

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Wind Breaker volume 1 by Satoru Nii is read ✅

I have mixed feelings. I like the drawing style, and the pace, so far the main character is very shonen, it has most of the ingredients to make it interesting.

At the end of the day I’m here for the fights, so I hope they don’t dwell too much on being the neighborhood pacifists and start fist-fighting.

I will buy the next volume 💸

With an 8.20 out of 10 on MyAnimeList Horimiya is a sweet slice-of-life / romance series about a group of friends in high-school.

I’ve binge-watched this anime in two days and enjoyed it quite a bit. It paints sweet romance stories that we all wished we had back in high school.

November 01, 2023

This time of the year in Catalonia it's tradition to eat (or should you have the skills, bake) "panellets" a sweet made mostly of almond and sugar with many variants.

I love the ones with pine nuts or lemon 🤩

These are homemade, my mum is the best (they made like 3kg worth 😂 )

📸 https://ricard.photos/%f0%9f%a4%a4-3/

⭐⭐⭐

🇯🇵 📚 Servamp volume 1 ✅

I like volumes with fat chapters like these, five chapters in one volume. Love it. Lots of content and fewer cliffhangers.

I think this volume was okay, maybe I would liked a little bit more action. They got us hooked in the first and second chapters, but that was it 🥲

More action 😁

This volume was very good, it was all action, no talking, I loved it.

We got to see new characters, Orochimaru the villain for this arc I suppose, and just good ninja stuff. The character development was also interesting, perhaps Sakura did the most growing.

Onto the next!

It has been a roller coaster with some episodes being very boring episodes and others stunning.

I wanted to see more of The Empire, and enjoyed very much the previous episodes about the DNA alterations.

Have you watched it?

October 03, 2023

"How Google Alters Search Queries to Get at Your Wallet"

"Say you search for “children’s clothing.” Google converts it, without your knowledge, to a search for “NIKOLAI-brand kidswear,” making a behind-the-scenes substitution of your actual query with a different query that just happens to generate more money for the company"

EDIT: WIRED in an update, has decided to remove the article 😮

➡️ https://www.wired.com/story/google-antitrust-lawsuit-search-results/

🆕 How to overwrite HTML with #Cypress

Here's a quick snippet to allow you change the HTML of a page before Cypress fires your tests.

It took me a little to find the solution, as the docs are not super clear. So I wrote this:

➡️ https://ricard.dev/how-to-overwrite-html-with-cypress/

September 09, 2023

@null Very impressive!

September 08, 2023

@bashlk Indeed!

I'm a big fan of JSDoc and can't see the benefit of using full TS in its place. Whenever something more complex is needed in JSDoc I create a simple interface. It's all comments, all valid JS.

September 08, 2023

💜 Loved this new #Fireship video about #TypeScript

I have been advocating for #JSDoc instead of going full TS for years.

➡️ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ChkQKUzDCs

#Frontend #JavaScript #WebDevelopment

September 08, 2023

🆕 Weeknote 36 (2023)

Alright! Second week of September and things are already in full gear. Here are some things going on 👇

"Faster Vue.js Execution in Firefox"

➡️ https://hacks.mozilla.org/2023/09/faster-vue-js-execution-in-firefox/

August 31, 2023

📺 Ahsoka 1x01

Maybe #Ahsoka chapter one was a little slow?

The action scenes were good, not much world building just yet and I don't feel super connected to the story. Like I need more context on where are we.

I'm not a hardcore #StarWars fan so all the timelines and characters are not on the top of my head.

I will continue watching 😊

August 29, 2023

August 29, 2023

📚 🇯🇵 Tokyo Revengers volume 4! ✅

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

This volume was very good, such an improvement compared to the last one.

We’ve got so much fighting and lots of story development. At this point, we haven’t been told how much has the present changed. Are we done? Is Hana safe? Uncertain.

I look forward to the next chapters.

➡️ https://manga.ricard.blog/reviews/tokyo-revengers/chapter/70/

#TokyoRenvegersManga #TokyoRenvegers

August 29, 2023

@ayo Nooo, owning your instance is fantastic :blobcat_sadlife:

If you need more content, have you considered relays?

If it's too much, how about pulling just some hashtags (what I do) https://github.com/g3rv4/GetMoarFediverse

Or simply have another account that follows a lot, and you follow that to populate your federated timeline.

August 29, 2023

@blackestclovers I felt #HouseOfTHeDragon was a far cry from #GameOfThrones

Nowhere near the same quality. Not production but the story itself. It felt just too disconnected. Where Game Of Thrones all the plots with the different characters / stories connected somehow and it was fantastic.

August 27, 2023

📚 🇯🇵 Tokyo Revengers volume 3! ✅

⭐️⭐️⭐️

This volume was overall a little weak. I think the plot has thickened a lot with this “back to square one” but we have not given many answers. It feels like we know nothing, at the start of volume 3.

Overall I feel the new characters Baji and Kazutora are not well developed. I liked the backstory with the killing of Mikey’s older brother but the hatred they feel for Mikey makes zero sense.

➡️ https://manga.ricard.blog/reviews/tokyo-revengers/chapter/51/

#TokyoRenvegersManga #TokyoRenvegers

August 23, 2023

✅ Tokyo Revengers volume 2!

⭐⭐⭐⭐

Lots of things happened in this second part. Pretty good volume 👌

It feels like we’re back to square one, though. We’re starting over with the same goal, to save them all probably (although I wouldn’t mind not saving Akkun, what an arse). What changed, though, is that Takemichi seems more decided now. I think he has learned and changed a bit, so I expect not to see the same thing again.

➡️ https://manga.ricard.blog/reviews/tokyo-revengers/chapter/33/

#TokyoRenvegersManga #TokyoRenvegers

📚 #AoAshi #manga volume 7 is done! ✅

It felt a little bit worse maybe because of the overall mood. We see Ashito struggling, people yelling at him, telling him to go home even 🤬

He’s being portrayed as knowing nothing (which could be somewhat true at being a defender) but is it too much? He’s brilliant at times (without realizing it, that’s fine!) but other times is like… “Oh right, I could watch videos and learn from them” 🤦‍♂️

August 11, 2023

In #JavaScript :javascript: what would this return?

"0 < Number.MIN_VALUE"

After voting, you may check the docs 😉

➡️ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number/MIN_VALUE

August 11, 2023

@elwinvaneede On point, Elwin.

I found it funny that the article was a little like "look at this new CSS feature that's more performant than JS" 😁

🆕 Frontend Coffee Break 🎧

Episode 19: Should you be constantly challenged?

What benefits frontend developers the most: working on long-term projects, or switching every six months? 🤝

Chucho and I discuss the FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) on new technologies in the changing world of frontend development.

➡️ https://frontendcoffeebreak.transistor.fm/s1/19

#podcast #Frontend #webDevelopment

August 10, 2023

⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

End of #AoAshi #manga volume 4! ✅

This volume has been very good overall, I think the best so far in terms of drawing.

Such intense panels, it has kept me reading fast. I read the whole volume in one sitting. I usually never do this, as I want to pace myself and enjoy them more. Was hard to stop reading this one. Well done.

➡️ https://manga.ricard.blog/reviews/ao-ashi/chapter/39/

#AoAshiManga

August 10, 2023

@gpage Now, I have even removed all the relays (which has lowered the CPU usage and storage considerably) in favor of https://github.com/g3rv4/GetMoarFediverse

If I started from scratch I would look at the alternatives, no doubt, before committing to a backend.

August 10, 2023

@gpage Hey Grayson, I stayed with Mastodon because moving the backend to Pleroma or Akkoma seemed very complicated while keeping the same domain. I could not encounter anyone that did it successfully.

I did not want to change the domain (or subdomain) or lose my followers.

After the disk usage issue was resolved, the Mastodon instance got very stable.

August 10, 2023

@scott So grateful for all the goodies in #CSS we've received this the past year.

Awesome push from all the browser vendors.

August 10, 2023

Are there even cases when a #CSS implementations of a #JavaScript :javascript: behavior performs worse than JS?

"A case study on scroll-driven animations performance"

➡️ https://developer.chrome.com/blog/scroll-animation-performance-case-study/

#Frontend #WebPerformance #WebDevelopment

August 10, 2023

@shanselman Bummer, I would imagine you're entitled to some compensation after landing. In the EU for long hauls, it's at least around 600€, better get informed.

Happened to me a few years back when flying from London to Seoul. I reached them out via social media and British Airways wired me the compensation in a matter of days. Great service.

August 10, 2023

If your GitHub Actions are not working, there's an incident not resolved yet

➡️ https://www.githubstatus.com/

I have finally finished the first season. Better late than never!

August 01, 2023

"How Back/forward Cache Helped Yahoo! JAPAN News Increase Revenue by 9% on Mobile"

➡️ https://web.dev/yahoo-japan-news-bfcache/

July 14, 2023

This is very nice! Look at this optional chaining proposal :javascript:

obj?.prop = value;

Which would be equivalent to:

if (obj) obj.prop = value;

I need this :blobcataww:

➡️ https://github.com/nicolo-ribaudo/proposal-optional-chaining-assignment

June 16, 2023

What options do I have on #Android to have the advanced multi-column #Mastodon layout? As I do on desktop web?

- #Tusky has a max number of columns. It's good but I want more columns.
- The official Mastodon app for Android doesn't even have custom columns 🤦‍♂️
- The mobile view of the PWA doesn't show custom columns either :blobcat_sadlife:

The only ugly workaround is to use "Desktop View" while on the PWA to get the desktop advanced view and pinch to zoom :blobcatnotlikethis:

I love having proper unit tests (using #Jest in my scenario), they give me so much confidence when it comes to specification changes to the component's logic.

📚 Manga: Bakuman - Chapter 2

⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Lots of text! When I compare Bakuman to Blue Lock, for instance, it takes me so much more time to digest each page. It’s not a bad thing, they are two completely different stories and one needs more action with less talking, while this one benefits from more context and information 👌

@losttourist
From my investigation there's no clean way to standup another instance in the same domain and don't break the internet. I guess it could be fine if you don't care about keeping followers and such (which I wanted to keep).

I'd love to read more if you end up going through with this.

April 24, 2023

@losttourist This same question is what I asked myself after installing Mastodon, running it for a couple of months and realizing I should have gone with #Akkoma for or a smaller backend. Mastodon is very nice but it's overkill for 1 user.

March 30, 2023

@jeena If it's the first time, and also depending on where you have your images could take hours.

If you still have images in the same disk as Mastodon is way faster. Deleting from S3 Object Storage is usually very slow. The whole cron task takes for me around 15 minutes.

Thank you for sharing and the mention, Jeena!

March 24, 2023

@ab Sure, added! ✅

March 24, 2023

@mondanzo@uwuwatch.club It's different. The cache retention deletes everything (posts you've liked, bookmarked, etc).

There's a PR to amend the text so it's easier to understand.

The CLI commands are way more refined and only delete stuff you haven't interacted with, etc.

March 24, 2023

@mondanzo@uwuwatch.club Does this help?

➡️ https://ricard.dev/improving-mastodons-disk-usage/

March 24, 2023

@julian :blobcatfingerguns:

March 24, 2023

@julian The downside (hence why I didn't do it) is that it can't be automated. I didn't want to have to request and export, download and import it to the other system manually.

Using the Mastodon API and GitHub Actions running every day, I know my archive is fresh every morning.

March 24, 2023

@julian You could totally skip the API. Just go to your Mastodon instance profile settings and request an export of your posts.

Then have Hugo or something else read that export and build a site with it.

March 16, 2023

@patrick I recently moved to another cloud provider.

Wasn't too hard to setup Mastodon again

Long story short, just install it and import the DB backup.

If you are using Object Storage the media assets are a non-issue. Otherwise maybe rsync to bring them to the other machine?

https://ricard.dev/moving-from-linode-to-netcup/

March 16, 2023

@ayo From my research it's very lightweight, night and day compared to Mastodon when it comes to hardware requirements.

But moving an existing account to another BE on the same domain... I couldn't find a success story anywhere.

March 15, 2023

Trying out the new Bing chat which now uses GPT-4 :blobcatglare:

I've sent it a pure :javascript: function and asked it to provide unit tests for it :blobcateyes:

It did. I've pasted them into my project without any change and all green ✅

I don't think it will take our jobs but it will speed things up and save us from slow tasks. We developers should focus on a bigger picture :blobcatthinking:

Your thoughts❓

➡️ https://blogs.bing.com/search/march_2023/Confirmed-the-new-Bing-runs-on-OpenAI%E2%80%99s-GPT-4

March 09, 2023

🏦 Banks... 😒

1. I've tried to do two different purchases with my credit card (to two different stores) and the purchases got denied ❌

2. Contacted my bank and they said there's a problem with the store not my card :blobfoxthinkanime:

3. Used a friend's card from the same bank to buy on the same store. Success ✅

4. The bank says they'll send me a new credit card :blobcatnotlikethis:

It's easier for them to issue a new card than try to find what's wrong with my current one 🤦‍♂️

📸 https://ricard.photos/%f0%9f%87%b0%f0%9f%87%b7-%f0%9f%a5%83/

March 08, 2023

@neverpanic Yeah for the position of the < > keys are on the other side (I do mostly programming)

If it were just re-mapping a letter here and there I would have already pulled the trigger.

The classic US layout has a big shift key on the right, we have the < > there. My brain is too wired after 35 years to use something different. I've tried! :blobcatnotlikethis:

February 26, 2023

@rolle @vito I think not. Mastodon will not know the files are gone, it will try to serve them and the S3 will return 404 until the sync is done.

The reason I turned it on before the sync was to have already the new files uploaded to the S3. Didn't want to have to do yet another sync after the first one.

Not sure if this make sense.

February 26, 2023

@rolle @vito I did the S3 switch while doing the sync. Being in a single-user instance that's not an issue, plus all the browser caching (or CDN if you have that already)

@ericmann Saving in commute time is a no brainier :blobcattea:

I find myself dropping by the office maybe once every two weeks to have lunch with colleagues I usually work with online.

After almost 3 years of work from home I'm just more productive here.

February 16, 2023

@rolle 1TB of assets? That's inmense for a 4 user instance 😮 I'm currently at 25Gb and have like 10-12 relays.

What does your cronjob to delete assets look like?

Here's mine: https://ricard.dev/improving-mastodons-disk-usage/

The only reason to change to an S3 would be reduce the storage cost. Not sure what's your deal with Hetzner but usually dedicated S3 object storage is just cheaper than regular SSD's.

February 16, 2023

@Robworks@phpc.social Thanks!

dynamic name attribute would be nice, markup is there on page load rather than waiting for JS. But you don't look very convinced 😁

February 16, 2023

@pixelcode I see it now 🙃 ✅

February 16, 2023

@rolle The server does not have to be offline, as mentioned you can point it to S3 so it starts uploading there while you sync

February 16, 2023

@rolle Yes, that should do it.

Since you're in, what seems to be, a single user instance you could do the following:

1. Change the Mastodon config to point to the S3 (yes, it would break the existing downloaded images but if it's just you using the instance, it's not a big issue. Byt doing this the newly found image would start to be uploaded directly to S3)

2. Start the sync using the CLI so the already downloaded go to the S3.

3. Done? 😁

February 16, 2023

@rolle thank you for the feedback!

I don't fully know how that storage mount works but you should be able to use a CLI to sync it to an S3. I've used AWS CLI and had no problems moving from local to S3 and the other way around.

February 12, 2023

@stormy178@mastodon.stormy178.com If the FE seems not to be correctly compiled try this one, should delete webpack's output:

RAILS_ENV=production bundle exec rails assets:clobber

Then the well known to build the FE again:

RAILS_ENV=production bundle exec rails assets:precompile

February 10, 2023

@afiestas @garritfra Well I think you don't usually put a CDN in front of cold storage data (glacier). It's meant to almost never be accessed. I'm not sure if you can even add a CDN in front.

For regular data you do standard S3 storage.

#Scaleway

February 06, 2023

😮 Learning about cold storage (S3 Glacier compatible Object Storage).

This particular provider states:

"Stored in a former nuclear fallout shelter 25 meters underground, your data is totally secure and isolated from all natural and technological risks."

💡 Thinking about using it for storing my processed photos (around 600Gb) which should cost me about 1.5€ / month. I do need assurance against nuclear war :blobfoxthinkanime:

#Scaleway

February 05, 2023

@ayo Agreed! I'm looking forward the next 4.1.0 release where we'll be able to remove avatars and/or headers from remote accounts. Which wasn't possible until just now.

Truth be told I used to just delete the headers folder manually once every few weeks to free up my S3 storage. I couldn't care less for profile headers.

February 05, 2023

@ayo Yeah, not with Mastodon. I think #Akkoma and #Pleroma work like that, they don't download remote assets.

But it's not a great architecture either, because all instances act as CDN for you.

Granted it takes a lot of space on your instance but if a remove instance goes down, is not available or just slow you don't notice it.

February 05, 2023

@ayo @elias What a coincidence 😆 I'm moving Object Storage provider today and it's being a challenge so far.

I've managed to download 50Gb of assets from old S3 provider and now I'm trying to upload to the new provider. But the default upload set it to "private" which is no good. Trying to find a flag/command with the aws CLI to recursively upload while setting public policy.

Tough stuff!

EDIT: I think I've found it

"--recursive --acl public-read"

Not sure how much this contributed to the main story. Just to make the whole world setting sadder?

@simevidas As usual I think it depends on the type of website. Most marketing websites that are presentation, sure 💜 The less JavaScript the better.

January 18, 2023

@overminddl1 I think the reason was particularly because #Pleroma does not download assets to the server. Meaning the other instances act as a CDN for pleroma servers. This model is unsustainable for large instances.

When you use Mastodon, you get all the assets downloaded and served from your instance.

January 18, 2023

@overminddl1 That's sad. I read that some admins ban based on the backend used, like if you use #Pleroma you get instant ban

#WebPerformance

January 11, 2023

@charlesroper I like Cypress for simple stuff, it can get complex fast if you need to mock API's and stuff.

The syntax in the end it's JavaScript unfortunately, should you be looking for no-code.

It has a built-in test recorder (records clicks, keyboard strokes and such) so you can create tests easily. For less advanced users that don't want to write the tests manually.

December 26, 2022

@kabir #Pleroma last time I checked looked a bit unmatained, there was no column frontend UI (which I love).

To "solve" the storage issue I eneded up moving the assets to a super cheap S3 object storage. It's less than 1$ a month

➡️ https://ricard.dev/scaling-mastodon-moving-media-assets-to-object-storage/

December 26, 2022

@kabir There's a command merged to the stable (not yet released) that will delete old avatars and headers. Which are currently not deleted by any out of the box command.

If you don't care about headers (I don't) some ideas we've had:

- Replace all images by a 1x1 pixel file
- Just delete the headers folder (that's why I currently do)

➡️ https://ricard.dev/improving-mastodons-disk-usage/

December 26, 2022

#MastoAdmin

Removing media files (using #backblazeB2 ) is very slow 🐌

Running the command right now says 11.000 files pending to be deleted and estimated time is 1.5 hours 😢

"tootctl media remove --days 4"

- Does this happen to you ❓
- Any idea how to speed it up ❓

December 21, 2022

@pasmac What do you mean?

Some single-user instance admins say you don't even need a CDN, that they pull directly form the S3 bucket.

Since it's actually free for my usage, I decided to use AWS CloudFront in front of the S3 bucket, to reduce even more the usage in the bucket.

Not sure if I made any sense 😁

December 21, 2022

2. Also yes, I turned on the "only last version".

I don't recall changing anything else.

December 07, 2022

@matt @nobodyknows that's how #Pleroma does it. They don't store remote assets.

On one side big instances would suffer as being CDN for all smaller instances. The same way, a smaller instance with popular accounts would suffer.

It could also be if those servers were slow serving you or your users would have a degraded experience. That's one of the reasons, I think, Mastodon chose the architecture of storing everything locally.

Just guessing.

December 07, 2022

@matt @nobodyknows true, you might not even need CDN

December 07, 2022

@matt @nobodyknows that's exactly what I did. So far so good.

#BackBlaze seems to be one of the best and cheapest options. Go for it.

Don't forget a CDN. I used AWS CloudFront with their ridiculous high free tier.

@arda The pinned posts from @blasteh are a good starting point.

#IndianaJones #Movies

December 01, 2022

@garritfra CloudFront from #AWS has an absurd high monthly free tier

- 1 TB of data transfer out
- 10,000,000 HTTP or HTTPS Requests
- 2,000,000 CloudFront Function Invocations

https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/pricing/

I didn't but if you don't mind moving your domain DNS to Cloudflare, they also offer free CDN egress cost with B2 https://www.backblaze.com/b2/solutions/content-delivery.html

@garritfra Hope you can rest during the weekend :blobcatheart:

@YoSiJo I guess as simple as:

listen 443 ssl;
listen [::]:443 ssl;

November 27, 2022

@YoSiJo Hey, thanks 💜

Just an hour ago I realized I had IPv6 DNS record for the domain and no NGINX for port 80

I've updated the DNS record to remove it. So it looks exactly like all my other domains.

On the other hand, should I keep the IPv6 record I'm not sure how would I'd fix the wrong cert for serving from NGINX.

November 27, 2022

@wild1145 I think it could have been something with IPv6

I've compared my other domains and .dev had it set up at the Linode Domain dashboard, for some reason.

I've removed the extra configuration (which I don't remember creating) for IPv6 and now they look the same, see if that solves it after propagation 🤞

Thank you again for the feedback 💜

November 27, 2022

@stibbons@social.yeoldenerds.online One big problem is that avatars/headers are not purged with any of the out of the box commands.

There's a lengthy GitHub issue about this with no solution from #Mastodon just yet.

I've written some ideas here: https://ricard.dev/improving-mastodons-disk-usage/

#MastoAdmin

November 27, 2022

📈 Improving Mastodon’s disk usage

♻️ Updated: I've added a snippet to re-compress images if you're not a fan of deleting the entire cache (avatar/header) folder.

➡️ https://ricard.dev/improving-mastodons-disk-usage/

November 17, 2022

@digiphile @mathewi Good piece!

I think it's too dangerous for the journalist to huddle in the same instance. They are looking for some sort of "verification" by being in that instance, but that's just too easy to block.

Granted, you can block individual users instead. In any case this, doesn't seem very decentralized to have them all in one instance.

Why not spread around and use the built-in verification system?

November 11, 2022

Filter feed by language #FediTips

@profcarroll How am I learning about this just now!?

Thanks! 💜

November 11, 2022

@jeremyckahn I've been running my single-user instance for a couple it weeks. Storage is everything, not so much CPU or RAM. It fills up fast.

So for multiple users I would expect you have to add extra "object storage". AWS S3 usually being the cheapest, we're talking $1 for several dozen GBs, it's not so bad. VPS providers also have these.

I would not recommend having the instance open for all without a Patreon model or similar.

November 11, 2022

@jeremyckahn depends on the user size. Single-user instance probably runs fine in a 5$ Linode

November 11, 2022

@danyork So true, Dan

That's also why we need more smaller instances rather than centralize everyone on mastodon dot social

This way it's just easy to block unwanted people or federate with instances you're happy with 💜

November 11, 2022

@verbeeld You should definitely host your own! 💜

The #devOps part is not trivial as it needs proper setup (beyond the official installation docs) otherwise it fills the disk very rapidly (thus increasing the hosting costs).

It is nonetheless fun 😃

November 11, 2022

@jan@geekcompass.com I would only find it troubling if you were sharing a DM or a meant-to-be-private communication. But a public Tweet or post? Well, it was public to begin with.

What am I missing?

November 10, 2022

Mastodon server tuning

@nolan The worst part so far is disk space for cache on remote media, avatars and headers.

Avatars and headers seem to never get purged, it just keeps on filling up 🙄

I ended up doing a bash script to replace all header files with a 1x1 pixel to save space. As I don't really care for user headers.

November 10, 2022

Mastodon server tuning

@nolan Thank you for sharing this, Nolan!

I haven't felt the Sidekiq memory leak in my single-user instance yet but I'll add the auto restart regardless.

@jbinto Nice!

- Hashtags work fine on my instance, I can search for them and pin them in columns.

- You can easily mute or suspend instances from interacting with your from the Admin dashboard

It's gotta be easier to code for #GitHub when the users, developers, tend to use the the latest (or even beta channels).

It's harder with regular customers stuck at #IE11 💀

Thankfully the customer I mostly work for dropped support for IE11. Now we're stuck with an "old" Safari, AKA "the new IE" 🤦‍♂️

➡️ https://github.blog/2022-06-10-how-we-think-about-browsers/

[Mastodon]

💡 I didn't think that Since I'm the only user in my instance the Federated timeline is just like Home timeline.

It's a little bit harder to find new people to follow than in a bigger multi-user instance.

October 21, 2022

The old architecture still works. Separate CSS and #JavaScript , inline critical render path, etc.

I never liked #CSS in #JS. Do you?

"Why We're Breaking Up with CSS-in-JS "

https://dev.to/srmagura/why-were-breaking-up-wiht-css-in-js-4g9b

#WebPerformance

You can still host for free on GitHub pages.

October 21, 2022

I recently setup a pull CDN for my photography blog using #AWS Cloudfront's free tier 💰

1TB of data transfer out, for free. Always. It's just awesome.

https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/
